General.Name: BIM Birlesik Magazalar AS
General.Description: BIM Birlesik Magazalar A.S., together with its subsidiaries, operates retail stores in Turkey, Morocco, and Egypt. Its stores sell meat, breakfast and dairy, legumes and bakery, and cosmetics and paper products, as well as beverages, snacks and sweets, fruits and vegetables, frozen foods, oils, and cleaning supplies. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

0.Name: Mr. Mustafa Latif Topbas
